General.Name: Jilin Power Share Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Jilin Electric Power Co.,Ltd. engages in the power generation and heating business in China. It generates electricity from thermal power, hydro power, wind power, and photovoltaic sources, as well as gas power, biomass, and nuclear energy. The company supplies industrial water; wholesales, operates, procures, and sells coal; procurement of charcoal; constructs and operates power stations; and offers maintenance and operation services. Jilin Electric Power Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Changchun, China.
